import React from 'react' import {NavLink} from "react-router-dom"; import rock from '../assets/rock-paper-scissors-296854_1280.png' import scissor from '../assets/rock-paper-scissors-296853_1280.png' import paper from '../assets/rock-paper-scissors-296855_1280.png' import white from '../assets/bg_picture.png' import '../App.css' import useSound from 'use-sound'; import sound from '../assets/salamisound-3834747-alarm-electric-alarm-clock.mp3' export const Game = (props) => { const userStep = () => { switch (props.userStep) { case 'r': return rock case 's': return scissor case 'p': return paper } } const compStep = () => { switch (props.computerStep) { case 'r': return rock case 's': return scissor case 'p': return paper } } const [play] = useSound(sound); return (
{!props.nick ? 'User': props.nick} picked {props.userStep === 'r' ? 'Rock' : props.userStep === 's' ? 'Scissor' : 'Paper'}
The Computer picked {props.computerStep === 'r' ? 'Rock' : props.computerStep === 's' ? 'Scissor' : 'Paper'}
{props.userStep && }
{props.message}
{ props.message && }
{}
) }
